âš ï¸ Nameserver Setup Required

After purchasing hosting, you'll need to update your domain's nameservers to:

We'll provide detailed setup instructions after purchase.

nameserver_instructions.godaddy:
GoDaddy Instructions:
1. Log in to your GoDaddy account
2. Go to "My Products" â†’ "DNS"
3. Find your domain and click "Manage"
4. Scroll to "Nameservers" section
5. Select "I'll use my own nameservers"
6. Enter: {nameservers}
7. Click "Save"
nameserver_instructions.namecheap:
Namecheap Instructions:
1. Log in to your Namecheap account
2. Go to "Domain List" â†’ find your domain
3. Click "Manage" next to your domain
4. Go to "Nameservers" tab
5. Select "Custom DNS"
6. Enter: {nameservers}
7. Click the checkmark to save
nameserver_instructions.google_domains:
Google Domains Instructions:
1. Log in to your Google Domains account
2. Find your domain and click "Manage"
3. Go to "DNS" tab
4. Scroll to "Name servers"
5. Select "Use custom name servers"
6. Enter: {nameservers}
7. Click "Save"
nameserver_instructions.generic:
DNS Setup:
1. Go to your domain registrar
2. Change nameservers to:
{nameservers}
3. Save & wait for propagation

ğŸ’¡ Need help? Contact your registrar's support.
